data.title: Hans Schaidinger
data.meta_description: Hans Schaidinger is a former mayor of the city of Regensburg, Germany from 1996 to 2014. He studied economics, is married and father of two daughters. Schaidinger entered service for the city of Regensburg in 1978 and was working in the areas of economy support and city development. From 1991 to 1996 he was working for the DIBAG Industriebau AG in Munich. In 1996 he was first elected mayor of Regensburg and reelected in 2002 and 2008.
